Description:
Perfect Home Close To Everything!
Make no mistake, this home will sell! Located in the popular Arcadia estate, conveniently close to local schools, Shops, the Princes Freeway, M1, Cardinia Road Railway Station and public transport.
This young beautiful family home offers:
- Four spacious bedrooms
- Ensuite and Walk-in Robe to master
- Modern open plan living
- Generous size kitchen with plenty of space
- Outdoor alfresco great for entertaining!
- Easy to maintain garden
- Gas Ducted Heating
- Split system cooling
- Plus much, much more.....
It's an outstanding opportunity with plenty to offer for the first home buyer, downsizer or investor.
What more could you ask for!
** Investors: Did you know Harcourts Narre Warren South are one of the largest rental management agencies in the South East? Our Business Development Department has appraised this property at $360- $365p/w ($1,564-$1,586) for more details about leasing contact office on 9705 3000 today.

Description:
MODERN FAMILY HAVEN!
Situated in the sought-after Arena Estate, this immaculately maintained home, is perfect for the first home buyer, investor or those simply wanting to downsize.
The open plan living features a hostess kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and ample storage and bench space. Adjacent is the impressive family meals and naturally lit living area, that opens to the undercover decked alfresco, complete with café style blinds – perfect for the keen entertainer.
The accommodation comprises of three spacious bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk in robe, with the remaining bedrooms complete with built in robes that are serviced by a central family bathroom.
Additional features include, ducted heating, split system air conditioning, oversized double car garage with rear roller access, distinctive low maintenance gardens pleasantly frame the useable 375m2 allotment.
Located within walking distance to parkland, public transport, schools and the Arena Shopping centre.

Description:
PICTURE PERFECT
This lovely, modern contemporary home showcasing a neutral colour palette will suit first home buyers, investors or those looking to move into a low maintenance, easy living home.
Perfectly positioned in the newly established estate of Park Central which has quickly established into a lovely pocket of town set a little away from the hustle and bustle but close enough to enjoy all that Beaconsfield and Officer have to offer, including boutique and mainstream shopping, delightful cafes and restaurants, quality schools and in close proximity to public transport. Purchasing in this estate sets you in a great position to capture the growth that will naturally occur as the area continues to build with the lovely homes being created.
The family friendly floor plan boasts four bedrooms, master complete with en suite and walk in robes and built ins to all secondary rooms, two spacious living zones inclusive of the open plan fully appointed stone kitchen and dining area as well as a formal lounge and all is positioned on over a 500m2 private parcel of land.
Additional desired features include double remote garage with direct entry, ducted heating, 2 x S/S, air cons, outdoor entertaining area overlooking the low maintenance gardens.
Phone Jeanine 0438 332 411.

Description:
Porter Davis Stunner in Officer
If you are after style and location, look no further than this beautiful Porter Davis built family home ideally located in The Potters Grove Estate, this well presented home offers great value and an outstanding opportunity for both first home buyers and investors. It is perfectly positioned within close proximity to parkland, train station, schools, Officer town centre and the Beaconsfield shopping precinct.
Comprising four fitted well sized bedrooms, master with ensuite, two spacious living areas incorporating a rumpus/theatre room, large family area and open plan kitchen with Walk in pantry, stone bench top, splashback, dishwasher and 900mm appliances. Extra appointments include evaporative cooling, gas ducted heating, high ceilings, security alarm, remote controlled double car garage and a 6 star energy efficiency performance.
Century 21 Wyndham City welcomes you and looks forward to meet you at the open homes.
Call Sanj on 0433 575 010 today to set an appointment for private inspection!!
*Photo ID is a must for all inspections*

Description:
The best buy in Officer
Located off Mary St, next to Arcadia Estate, just a short distance the to freeway entrance, the train station and shopping centres is this unit under construction.
Expected to be finished by May (subject to delay), this currently is the only unit on offer in the entire development, this is not the last to sell, it has come back on the market.
- 2 bedrooms
- 1 bathroom
- single garage
Turn key inclusions, optional upgrade pack on offer, $4000 includes remote garage door, air conditioner and a dishwasher.
First home buyers who qualify for the grant get $10,000 towards this purchase price plus stamp duty concessions. Now you can buy an almost completed unit, get the maximum grant and save stamp duty, it does not get much better.
Please note that the photos were taken on the 8th of February, the facade is not completed, it will feature stonework.
Be quick this is not going to last, call Adam Lord on 0422 229 723 for an inspection.

Description:
Immaculate backyard, perfect for everyone !!
Demonstrating perfection in the highly sought after ‘Arcadia’ estate, presents this luxurious ‘Burbank’ built residence with modern façade tailored with brilliant inclusions and cleverly designed floorplan to provide exceptional living and entertaining the whole family will enjoy, this one is not to be missed!
The contemporary kitchen is tailored with 900mm Westinghouse stainless steel appliances, glass splash back, ample bench space, dishwasher, walk in pantry and finished with brilliant fixtures and fittings.
When open plan living is a must, this home has it all. A spacious light filled living and dining area with an additional living zone situated at the front of the home and a third living/study area to suit all members of the family.
The designer master bedroom includes a walk-in robe and ensuite with stone benches. Additional 3 bedrooms equipped with built in robes and serviced by the main bathroom with stone benches located near the oversized walk in linen cupboard making it perfect for that extra storage.
If entertaining is what you like, this stunning backyard with a covered outdoor entertaining area overlooks the beautifully landscaped backyard. It is perfect for your summer barbeques and Sunday entertaining with family and friends. Plenty of yard space perfect for the kids to enjoy and a great sized shed, no expense has been spared.
Zoned Ducted heating and split system air-conditioning, double remote-control garage with internal access.
When location is everything, look no further! Excellently situated close to schools, shops, transport and parks, this home is exactly what you’ve been looking for.
Call Nicola now to schedule an inspection or see us at one of our opens!

BUILD YOUR DREAM HOME ON 1027m2 (approx.) MAKE AN OFFER NOW!
Situated in the Grandvue Estate of the booming Officer, this approx. 1027m2 vacant block of land might be the last block one of this size left in the area, and has all the necessary connections available to build your dream home here.
The large, elevated block, surrounded by beautiful brand new homes, offers views of the rolling hills around, and could be such a great place to raise your family here, or just to enjoy the quite life this place can offer.
Having the advantages of being close to multiple shopping centres, local private and government schools, close to the town centre, train station and easy access to freeways, this is an opportunity not to be missed!
Call now to make an offer before it's sold!

Description:
Hidden Gem In Timbertop
Located in the highly sought Timbertop Estate on a private road you will find this hidden gem. As you step into the home you get an instant grasp of how light and bright the home is, comprising of 3 bedrooms, the master with full ensuite and walk in robe, whilst the other 2 sizeable bedrooms both have built in robes and share a central bathroom with stone benchtops and separate toilet. A carefully thought out floorplan finds the lounge room, meals area and stylish kitchen complete with stone and stainless steel appliances looking out to the low maintenance backyard. Additional features of the home include ducted heating, 2 split system air conditioners, stone throughout and a double garage. This home is sure to appeal to a multitude of buyers including first home buyers, down sizers and investors and with the added bonus of having great neighbours don’t hesitate in inspecting this property.

Description:
CONVENIENCE PLUS!
Situated in a popular Officer location you'll find this young, very appealing family home. The accommodation offers four bedrooms, the main with a full ensuite and robes. The other three bedrooms are a good size and also have built in robes. The living space is open plan' comprising lounge, kitchen and dining leading to the rear garden through sliding patio doors. The modern kitchen has quality stainless steel appliances including large gas cooktop, electric oven, dishwasher, stone bench tops and plenty of cupboard space. There's a family bathroom, laundry and separate toilet. Other features include high ceilings, ducted heating and a split system air conditioner. Outside you have a good size rear garden, double remote garage with internal access and off-street parking. Conveniently close to local schools and shopping, the Princes Freeway, Cardinia Road Railway Station, public transport and the new Club Officer'. Currently leased to a great tenant until October, 2018 it provides a secure investment, or if you're looking as an owner occupier the option is to purchase now, take over the lease and move in when the lease expires.
IT'S WELL WORTH CONSIDERING!

Description:
A GEM IN ARCADIA!
This modern four bedroom plus study home is the perfect opportunity for the first home buyer, downsizer or savvy investor looking for spacious living on a low maintenance allotment.
The flowing floorplan offers a formal lounge and a light filled family/meals area adjoining the deluxe kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances and breakfast bar.
The master bedroom features a walk in robe and a luxurious ensuite with floor to ceiling tiling. The remaining three generous sized bedrooms feature large built in robes and are serviced by a family bathroom.
Additional highlights include, bifold doors that open effortlessly to the low maintenance backyard, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm system and a rear loaded double car garage, make this an opportunity not to be missed!
Only minutes from Cardinia Station, shopping facilities, parkland, Primary and Secondary schools.

Description:
Titled block in Timbertop with premium views!
Sitting at the back right corner of the prestigious Timbertop Estate by Parklea, is this large and elevated block - titled and ready to build on. The block measures in at 674sqm approx. and offers a great opportunity to build your next residence (STCA). Living in such a position offers the opportunity to build a grand and superior home close to nearby schools, public transport, shops and freeway access. This exciting and rare opportunity will not last long, so don't hesitate to get in touch.

Description:
BRAND NEW READY TO GO!
Opportunity awaits the lucky buyer of this freshly built three bedroom home in the sought after Arcadia Estate! Set close to all amenities such as schools, shops, Club Officer, medical facilities and only a short distance to Cardinia Road train station, this home has all you could ask for.
Upon entry you are welcomed with a spacious master bedroom, ensuite with walk in robe with the two remaining great sized bedrooms featuring built-in-robes and their own private hallway connecting to the main bathroom and separate toilet.
The open plan kitchen features 900MM stainless steel appliances, Caesar stone bench tops, dishwasher and plenty of bench and cupboard space. The home also has some great features included such as ducted heating, split system air-conditioner, quality roller blinds throughout with a low maintenance gardens with no work to be done. Plenty to offer for the first home buyer, downsizer, retiree or investor!
This is a brand new home not to be missed call today to organize an inspection!
